title: Rangolis and diyas lit  up for Diwali
caption: Rangolis and diyas lit  up for Diwali
desc: Today the country, as well as Hindu settlements all over the planet, observe the festival of Diwali. Diwali is generally observed as the symbolic victory of good over evil, and light over darkness. The festival of lights dates to prehistoric times, and some accept it as a representation of a successful harvest – with diyas representing the presence of the life-giving sun.
copyright: Diwali rangoli and diyas in Varanasi, U.P. (© Subir Basak/Getty Images)
